author: rcm
msg: Date didn't zero the hour properly.
Set lenient date parsing to off, so dates are not adjusted when out of range. E.g. 20/20/01 is now invalid rather than being converted to 20/8/02.

author: rcm
msg: Simplified the mouse event tracking and event generation.
Added a facility to bring up a debug window for the overlay view.
Adde a selector of lookup objects that allows an object to be selected from a drop down list.
Showing labels in dialogs for parametered action methods. Also setting value fields to their specified default values.
